item.title: Climate Smart Farming (CSF) Water Deficit Calculator
item.description: Developed By: Cornell University_College of Agriculture and Life Sciences Summary: Part of the Climate Smart Farming toolkit, the Water Deficit Calculator estimates soil water content within a crop’s effective root zone to predict potential water deficits and associated plant stress.
